docs.snippet: After 50 years writing criticism for newspapers, magazines and literary journals, John Simon has become a blogger. His first post is on ''Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark.'' And -- surprise, surprise -- he's got a contrary take.     Not on the merits...
docs.abstract: Veteran freelance critic John Simon, in his first Internet blog post, derides other critics who lambasted Broadway musical Spider-Man: Turn Off the Dark before it opens (M)

docs.snippet: SEITELMAN--Pearl, passed away peacefully on December 31, 2010. Beloved wife of Leo, mother to Edward and Mark, and mother-in-law to Minna. Funeral at Weinstein-Garlick, 1153 Coney Island Avenue at Avenue H, Brooklyn, NY, Sunday, 11:30am.
